rule.description: The PDF/UA version and conformance level of a file shall be specified using the PDF/UA Identification extension schema

error.message: The document metadata stream doesn't contains PDF/UA Identification Schema

rule.description: The value of "pdfuaid:part" shall be the part number of the International Standard to which the file conforms

error.message: The "part" property of the PDF/UA Identification Schema is %1 instead of 1 for PDF/UA-1 conforming file

rule.description: Property "part" of the PDF/UA Identification Schema shall have namespace prefix "pdfuaid"

error.message: Property "part" of the PDF/UA Identification Schema has invalid namespace prefix %1

rule.description: Property "amd" of the PDF/UA Identification Schema shall have namespace prefix "pdfuaid"

error.message: Property "amd" of the PDF/UA Identification Schema has invalid namespace prefix %1

rule.description: Property "corr" of the PDF/UA Identification Schema shall have namespace prefix "pdfuaid"

error.message: Property "corr" of the PDF/UA Identification Schema has invalid namespace prefix %1

rule.description: Content marked as Artifact should not present inside tagged content

error.message: Content marked as Artifact is present inside tagged content (parent struct element %1)

rule.description: Tagged content should not present inside content marked as Artifact

error.message: Tagged content (parent struct element %1) is present inside content marked as Artifact

rule.description: Content shall be marked as Artifact or tagged as real content

error.message: Content is neither marked as Artifact nor tagged as real content

rule.description: Files shall have a Suspects value of false(ISO 32000-1:2008, Table 321)

error.message: Suspects entry has a value of true

rule.description: All non-standard structure types shall be mapped to the nearest functionally equivalent standard type, as defined in ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.8.4, in the role map dictionary of the structure tree root. This mapping may be indirect; within the role map a non-standard type can map directly to another non-standard type, but eventually the mapping shall terminate at a standard type

error.message: Non-standard structure type %1 is not mapped to a standard type

rule.description: A circular mapping shall not exist

error.message: A circular mapping exists for %1 structure type

rule.description: Standard tags defined in ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.8.4, shall not be remapped

error.message: Standard type %1 is remapped

rule.description: The Catalog dictionary of a conforming file shall contain the Metadata key whose value is a metadata stream as defined in ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.3.2

error.message: The document catalog dictionary doesn't contain metadata key

rule.description: The Metadata stream in the document's catalog dictionary shall contain a dc:title entry, where dc is the recommended prefix for the Dublin Core metadata schema as defined in the XMP specification, which clearly identifies the document

error.message: Metadata stream does not contain dc:title

rule.description: The document catalog dictionary shall include a ViewerPreferences dictionary containing a DisplayDocTitle key, whose value shall be true

error.message: ViewerPreferences dictionary is not present in the document Catalog, or DisplayDocTitle key is set to false or is not present in the ViewerPreferences dictionary (ViewerPreferences = %1, DisplayDocTitle = %2)

rule.description: The logical structure of the conforming file shall be described by a structure hierarchy rooted in the StructTreeRoot entry of the document catalog dictionary, as described in ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.7

error.message: StructTreeRoot entry is not present in the document catalog

rule.description: A structure element dictionary shall contain the P (parent) entry according to ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.7.2, Table 355

error.message: A structure element dictionary does not contain the P (parent) entry

rule.description: Natural language in the Outline entries shall be determined

error.message: Natural language in the Outline entries cannot be determined

rule.description: Table element may contain only TR, THead, TBody, TFoot and Caption elements
rule.test: kidsStandardTypes.split('&').filter(elem => elem != 'TR' && elem != 'THead' && elem != 'TBody' && elem != 'TFoot' && elem != 'Caption').length == 0 || kidsStandardTypes == ''

error.message: Table element contains %1 element(s) instead of TR, THead, TBode, TFoot or Caption

arguments.argument: kidsStandardTypes.split('&').filter(elem => elem != 'TR' && elem != 'THead' && elem != 'TBody' && elem != 'TFoot' && elem != 'Caption').toString()

rule.description: TR element should be contained in Table, THead, TBody or TFoot element

error.message: TR element contained in %1 instead of Table, THead, TBody or TFoot element

rule.description: THead element should be contained in Table element

error.message: THead element contained in %1 instead of Table element

rule.description: TBody element should be contained in Table element

error.message: TBody element contained in %1 instead of Table element

rule.description: TFoot element should be contained in Table element

error.message: TFoot element contained in %1 instead of Table element

rule.description: TH element should be contained in TR element

error.message: TH element contained in %1 instead of TR element

rule.description: TD element should be contained in TR element

error.message: TD element contained in %1 instead of TR element

rule.description: TR element may contain only TH and TD elements

error.message: TR element contains %1 element(s) instead of TH or TD

rule.description: Table element should contain zero or one THead kid

error.message: Table element contains more than one THead kid

rule.description: Table element should contain zero or one TFoot kid

error.message: Table element contains more than one TFoot kid

rule.description: If Table element contains TFoot kid, Table element should contain one or more TBody kids

error.message: Table element contains TFoot kid, but not contains TBody kids

rule.description: If Table element contains THead kid, Table element should contain one or more TBody kids

error.message: Table element contains THead kid, but not contains TBody kids

rule.description: Table cell shall not have intersection with other cells

error.message: Table cell has intersection with other cells

rule.description: Table element may contain a Caption element as its first or last kid

error.message: Table element contains Caption as its %1 child instead of first or last one

rule.description: LI element should be contained in L element

error.message: LI element contained in %1 instead of L element

rule.description: LBody element should be contained in LI element

error.message: LBody element contained in %1 instead of LI element

rule.description: L element may contain only L, LI and Caption elements

error.message: L element contains %1 element(s) instead of L, LI or Caption

rule.description: LI element may contain only Lbl and LBody elements

error.message: LI element contains %1 element(s) instead of Lbl or LBody

rule.description: Natural language for text in ActualText attribute shall be determined
rule.test: ActualText == null || Lang_size != 0 || parentLang != null || gSizeCatalogLang != 0

error.message: Natural language for text in ActualText attribute cannot be determined

rule.description: Natural language for text in Alt attribute shall be determined
rule.test: Alt == null || Lang_size != 0 || parentLang != null || gSizeCatalogLang != 0

error.message: Natural language for text in Alt attribute cannot be determined

rule.description: Natural language for text in E attribute shall be determined
rule.test: E == null || Lang_size != 0 || parentLang != null || gSizeCatalogLang != 0

error.message: Natural language for text in E attribute cannot be determined

rule.description: Natural language in the Contents entry for annotations shall be determined

error.message: Natural language in the Contents entry for annotations cannot be determined

rule.description: Natural language in the TU key for form fields shall be determined

error.message: Natural language in the TU key for form fields cannot be determined

rule.description: TOCI element should be contained in TOC element

error.message: TOCI element contained in %1 instead of TOC element

rule.description: TOC element may contain only TOC, TOCI and Caption elements

error.message: TOC element contains %1 element(s) instead of TOC, TOCI or Caption

rule.description: TOC element may contain a Caption element only as its first kid

error.message: TOC element contains Caption as its %1 child instead of first one

rule.description: If the Lang entry is present in the document's Catalog dictionary or in a structure element dictionary or property list, its value shall be a language identifier as described in ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.9.2. A language identifier shall be a Language-Tag as defined in RFC 3066, Tags for the Identification of Languages

error.message: Value %1 of the Lang entry is not a Language-Tag

rule.description: Natural language for text in ActualText attribute in Span Marked Content shall be determined
rule.test: tag != 'Span' || ActualText == null || Lang != null || inheritedLang != null || gSizeCatalogLang != 0

error.message: Natural language for text in ActualText attribute in Span Marked Content cannot be determined

rule.description: Natural language for text in Alt attribute in Span Marked Content shall be determined
rule.test: tag != 'Span' || Alt == null || Lang != null || inheritedLang != null || gSizeCatalogLang != 0

error.message: Natural language for text in Alt attribute in Span Marked Content cannot be determined

rule.description: Natural language for text in E attribute in Span Marked Content shall be determined
rule.test: tag != 'Span' || E == null || Lang != null || inheritedLang != null || gSizeCatalogLang != 0

error.message: Natural language for text in E attribute in Span Marked Content cannot be determined

rule.description: Natural language for document metadata shall be determined

error.message: Natural language for document metadata cannot be determined

rule.description: Natural language for text in page content shall be determined

error.message: Natural language for text in page content cannot be determined

rule.description: THead element may contain only TR elements

error.message: THead element contains %1 element(s) instead of TR

rule.description: TBody element may contain only TR elements

error.message: TBody element contains %1 element(s) instead of TR

rule.description: TFoot element may contain only TR elements

error.message: TFoot element contains %1 element(s) instead of TR

rule.description: Table element may contain only one Caption element

error.message: Table element contains %1 Caption elements instead of one

rule.description: L element may contain a Caption element only as its first kid

error.message: L element contains Caption as its %1 child instead of first one

rule.description: Table columns shall have the same number of rows (taking into account row spans)

error.message: Table columns 1 and %1 span different number of rows

rule.description: Table rows shall have the same number of columns (taking into account column spans)

error.message: Table rows 1 and %1 span different number of columns

rule.description: Table rows shall have the same number of columns (taking into account column spans)

error.message: Table rows 1 and %1 span different number of columns (%2 and %3 respectively)

rule.description: Figure tags shall include an alternative representation or replacement text that represents the contents marked with the Figure tag as noted in ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.7.2, Table 323

error.message: Figure structure element neither has an alternate description nor a replacement text

rule.description: For documents that are not strongly structured, as described in ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.8.4.3.5, heading tags shall be used as follows: (*) If any heading tags are used, H1 shall be the first. (*) A document may use more than one instance of any specific tag level. For example, a tag level may be repeated if document content requires it. (*) If document semantics require a descending sequence of headers, such a sequence shall proceed in strict numerical order and shall not skip an intervening heading level. (*) A document may increment its heading sequence without restarting at H1 if document semantics require it

error.message: Heading level %1 is skipped in a descending sequence of header levels

rule.description: Each node in the tag tree shall contain at most one child H tag

error.message: A node contains more than one H tag

rule.description: All documents shall be either strongly or weakly structured, but not both

error.message: Document uses both H and H# tags

rule.description: All documents shall be either strongly or weakly structured, but not both

error.message: Document uses both H and H# tags

rule.description: If the table's structure is not determinable via Headers and IDs, then structure elements of type TH shall have a Scope attribute

error.message: TD does not contain Headers attribute, and Headers for this table cell cannot be determined algorithmically

rule.description: If the table's structure is not determinable via Headers and IDs, then structure elements of type TH shall have a Scope attribute

error.message: TD references undefined Header(s) %1, and Headers for this table cell cannot be determined algorithmically

rule.description: All mathematical expressions shall be enclosed within a Formula tag as detailed in ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.8.4.5 and shall have Alt or ActualText attributes

error.message: Formula structure element neither has an alternate description nor a replacement text

rule.description: Note tag shall have ID entry

error.message: ID key of the Note tag is not present

rule.description: Each Note tag shall have unique ID key

error.message: ID key %1 of the Note tag is non-unique

rule.description: Each optional content configuration dictionary that forms the value of the D key, or that is an element in the array that forms the value of the Configs key in the OCProperties dictionary, shall contain the Name key

error.message: Missing or empty Name entry of the optional content configuration dictionary

rule.description: The AS key shall not appear in any optional content configuration dictionary

error.message: AS key is present in the optional content configuration dictionary

rule.description: The file specification dictionary for an embedded file shall contain the non-empty F and UF keys
rule.test: containsEF == false || (F != null && F != '' && UF != null && UF != '')

error.message: The file specification dictionary for an embedded file does not contain either F or UF key or at least one of the keys is empty (F = %1, UF = %2)

rule.description: Dynamic XFA forms shall not be used

error.message: Dynamic XFA forms is present

rule.description: An encrypted conforming file shall contain a P key in its encryption dictionary (ISO 32000-1:2008, 7.6.3.2, Table 21). The 10th bit position of the P key shall be true

error.message: The file is encrypted but does not contain a P entry in its encryption dictionary or the file is encrypted and does contain a P entry, but the 10th bit position of the P entry is false (P = %1, 10th bit = %2)

rule.description: An annotation, excluding annotations of subtype Widget, Popup or Link, shall be nested within an Annot tag
rule.test: Subtype == 'Widget' || Subtype == 'Popup' || Subtype == 'Link' || isOutsideCropBox == true || (F & 2) == 2 || structParentStandardType == 'Annot'

error.message: %1 annotation is an Artifact or is nested within %2 tag (standard type = %3) instead of Annot

rule.description: An annotation (except annotations of type Link, Widget or Popup, or hidden annotations, or those having rectangle outside the crop-box) shall have either Contents key or an Alt entry in the enclosing structure element
rule.test: Subtype == 'Widget' || Subtype == 'Popup' || Subtype == 'Link' || isOutsideCropBox == true || (F & 2) == 2 || (Contents != null && Contents != '') || (Alt != null && Alt != '')

error.message: %1 annotation whose hidden flag is not set and whose rectangle is not outside the crop-box has neither Contents key nor an Alt entry in the enclosing structure element

rule.description: A form field whose hidden flag is not set and whose rectangle is not outside the crop-box shall have a TU key present or all its Widget annotations shall have alternative descriptions (in the form of an Alt entry in the enclosing structure elements)
rule.test: isOutsideCropBox == true || (F & 2) == 2 || (TU != null && TU != '') || (Alt != null && Alt != '')

error.message: A form field whose hidden flag is not set and whose rectangle is not outside the crop-box neither has TU key nor its Widget annotations have alternative descriptions (in the form of an Alt entry in the enclosing structure element)

rule.description: Annotations of subtype TrapNet shall not be permitted

error.message: An annotation of subtype TrapNet exists

rule.description: Every page on which there is an annotation shall contain in its page dictionary the key Tabs, and its value shall be S

error.message: A page with annotation(s) contains Tabs key with value %1 instead of S

rule.description: A Widget annotation shall be nested within a Form tag per ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.8.4.5, Table 340

error.message: A Widget annotation is an Artifact or is nested within %1 tag (standard type = %2) instead of Form

rule.description: If the Form element omits a Role attribute (Table 348), it shall have only one child: an object reference (14.7.4.3) identifying the widget annotation per ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.8.4.5, Table 340

error.message: The Form element omits a Role attribute and doesn't have only one child identifying the widget annotation

rule.description: Links shall be tagged according to ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.8.4.4.2, Link Element

error.message: A Link annotation is an Artifact or is nested within %1 tag (standard type = %2) instead of Link

rule.description: Links shall contain an alternate description via their Contents key as described in ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.9.3

error.message: A link annotation does not include an alternate description in the Contents Key

rule.description: In the media clip data dictionary, the optional CT key (ISO 32000-1:2008, 13.2.4.2, Table 274) is required

error.message: CT key is missing from the media clip data dictionary

rule.description: In the media clip data dictionary, the optional Alt key (ISO 32000-1:2008, 13.2.4.2, Table 274) is required

error.message: Alt key (value %1) is missing from the media clip data dictionary or has incorrect value

rule.description: PrinterMark annotations, if present, shall be considered Incidental Artifacts, as if they are hidden page elements as defined in ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.8.2.2.3

error.message: A PrinterMark annotation is included in logical structure

rule.description: A conforming file shall not contain any reference XObjects

error.message: The document contains a reference XObject (Ref key in the form XObject dictionary)

rule.description: The content of Form XObjects shall be incorporated into structure elements according to ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.7.2

error.message: Form XObject contains MCIDs and is referenced more than once

rule.description: For any given composite (Type 0) font within a conforming file, the CIDSystemInfo entry in its CIDFont dictionary and its Encoding dictionary shall have the following relationship: - If the Encoding key in the Type 0 font dictionary is Identity-H or Identity-V, any values of Registry, Ordering, and Supplement may be used in the CIDSystemInfo entry of the CIDFont. - Otherwise, the corresponding Registry and Ordering strings in both CIDSystemInfo dictionaries shall be identical, and the value of the Supplement key in the CIDSystemInfo dictionary of the CIDFont shall be less than or equal to the Supplement key in the CIDSystemInfo dictionary of the CMap
rule.test: cmapName == "Identity-H" || cmapName == "Identity-V" || (CIDFontOrdering != null && CIDFontOrdering == CMapOrdering && CIDFontRegistry != null && CIDFontRegistry == CMapRegistry && CIDFontSupplement != null && CMapSupplement != null && CIDFontSupplement <= CMapSupplement)

error.message: CIDSystemInfo entries the CIDFont and CMap dictionaries of a Type 0 font are not compatible (CIDSystemInfo Ordering = %1, CMap Ordering = %2, CIDSystemInfo Registry = %3, CMap Registry = %4, CIDSystemInfo Supplement = %5, CMap Supplement = %6)

rule.description: ISO 32000-1:2008, 9.7.4, Table 117 requires that all embedded Type 2 CIDFonts in the CIDFont dictionary shall contain a CIDToGIDMap entry that shall be a stream mapping from CIDs to glyph indices or the name Identity, as described in ISO 32000-1:2008, 9.7.4, Table 117

error.message: A Type 2 CIDFont dictionary has missing or invalid CIDToGIDMap entry

rule.description: All CMaps used within a PDF/UA file, except those listed in ISO 32000-1:2008, 9.7.5.2, Table 118, shall be embedded in that file as described in ISO 32000-1:2008, 9.7.5
rule.test: CMapName == "Identity-H" || CMapName == "Identity-V" || CMapName == "GB-EUC-H" || CMapName == "GB-EUC-V" || CMapName == "GBpc-EUC-H" || CMapName == "GBpc-EUC-V" || CMapName == "GBK-EUC-H" || CMapName == "GBK-EUC-V" || CMapName == "GBKp-EUC-H" || CMapName == "GBKp-EUC-V" || CMapName == "GBK2K-H" || CMapName == "GBK2K-V" || CMapName == "UniGB-UCS2-H" || CMapName == "UniGB-UCS2-V" || CMapName == "UniGB-UFT16-H" || CMapName == "UniGB-UFT16-V" || CMapName == "B5pc-H" || CMapName == "B5pc-V" || CMapName == "HKscs-B5-H" || CMapName == "HKscs-B5-V" || CMapName == "ETen-B5-H" || CMapName == "ETen-B5-V" || CMapName == "ETenms-B5-H" || CMapName == "ETenms-B5-V" || CMapName == "CNS-EUC-H" || CMapName == "CNS-EUC-V" || CMapName == "UniCNS-UCS2-H" || CMapName == "UniCNS-UCS2-V" || CMapName == "UniCNS-UFT16-H" || CMapName == "UniCNS-UTF16-V" || CMapName == "83pv-RKSJ-H" || CMapName == "90ms-RKSJ-H" || CMapName == "90ms-RKSJ-V" || CMapName == "90msp-RKSJ-H" || CMapName == "90msp-RKSJ-V" || CMapName == "90pv-RKSJ-H" || CMapName == "Add-RKSJ-H" || CMapName == "Add-RKSJ-V" || CMapName == "EUC-H" || CMapName == "EUC-V" || CMapName == "Ext-RKSJ-H" || CMapName == "Ext-RKSJ-V" || CMapName == "H" || CMapName == "V" || CMapName == "UniJIS-UCS2-H" || CMapName == "UniJIS-UCS2-V" || CMapName == "UniJIS-UCS2-HW-H" || CMapName == "UniJIS-UCS2-HW-V" || CMapName == "UniJIS-UTF16-H" || CMapName == "UniJIS-UTF16-V" || CMapName == "KSC-EUC-H" || CMapName == "KSC-EUC-V" || CMapName == "KSCms-UHC-H" || CMapName == "KSCms-UHC-V" || CMapName == "KSCms-UHC-HW-H" || CMapName == "KSCms-UHC-HW-V" || CMapName == "KSCpc-EUC-H" || CMapName == "UniKS-UCS2-H" || CMapName == "UniKS-UCS2-V" || CMapName == "UniKS-UTF16-H" || CMapName == "UniKS-UTF16-V" || embeddedFile_size == 1

error.message: A non-standard CMap %1 is not embedded

rule.description: For those CMaps that are embedded, the integer value of the WMode entry in the CMap dictionary shall be identical to the WMode value in the embedded CMap stream

error.message: WMode entry (value %1) in the embedded CMap and in the CMap dictionary (value %2) are not identical

rule.description: A CMap shall not reference any other CMap except those listed in ISO 32000-1:2008, 9.7.5.2, Table 118
rule.test: CMapName == "Identity-H" || CMapName == "Identity-V" || CMapName == "GB-EUC-H" || CMapName == "GB-EUC-V" || CMapName == "GBpc-EUC-H" || CMapName == "GBpc-EUC-V" || CMapName == "GBK-EUC-H" || CMapName == "GBK-EUC-V" || CMapName == "GBKp-EUC-H" || CMapName == "GBKp-EUC-V" || CMapName == "GBK2K-H" || CMapName == "GBK2K-V" || CMapName == "UniGB-UCS2-H" || CMapName == "UniGB-UCS2-V" || CMapName == "UniGB-UFT16-H" || CMapName == "UniGB-UFT16-V" || CMapName == "B5pc-H" || CMapName == "B5pc-V" || CMapName == "HKscs-B5-H" || CMapName == "HKscs-B5-V" || CMapName == "ETen-B5-H" || CMapName == "ETen-B5-V" || CMapName == "ETenms-B5-H" || CMapName == "ETenms-B5-V" || CMapName == "CNS-EUC-H" || CMapName == "CNS-EUC-V" || CMapName == "UniCNS-UCS2-H" || CMapName == "UniCNS-UCS2-V" || CMapName == "UniCNS-UFT16-H" || CMapName == "UniCNS-UTF16-V" || CMapName == "83pv-RKSJ-H" || CMapName == "90ms-RKSJ-H" || CMapName == "90ms-RKSJ-V" || CMapName == "90msp-RKSJ-H" || CMapName == "90msp-RKSJ-V" || CMapName == "90pv-RKSJ-H" || CMapName == "Add-RKSJ-H" || CMapName == "Add-RKSJ-V" || CMapName == "EUC-H" || CMapName == "EUC-V" || CMapName == "Ext-RKSJ-H" || CMapName == "Ext-RKSJ-V" || CMapName == "H" || CMapName == "V" || CMapName == "UniJIS-UCS2-H" || CMapName == "UniJIS-UCS2-V" || CMapName == "UniJIS-UCS2-HW-H" || CMapName == "UniJIS-UCS2-HW-V" || CMapName == "UniJIS-UTF16-H" || CMapName == "UniJIS-UTF16-V" || CMapName == "KSC-EUC-H" || CMapName == "KSC-EUC-V" || CMapName == "KSCms-UHC-H" || CMapName == "KSCms-UHC-V" || CMapName == "KSCms-UHC-HW-H" || CMapName == "KSCms-UHC-HW-V" || CMapName == "KSCpc-EUC-H" || CMapName == "UniKS-UCS2-H" || CMapName == "UniKS-UCS2-V" || CMapName == "UniKS-UTF16-H" || CMapName == "UniKS-UTF16-V"

error.message: A CMap references another non-standard CMap %1

rule.description: The font programs for all fonts used for rendering within a conforming file shall be embedded within that file, as defined in ISO 32000-1:2008, 9.9

error.message: The font program is not embedded

rule.description: Embedded fonts shall define all glyphs referenced for rendering within the conforming file. A font referenced solely in text rendering mode 3 is not rendered and is thus exempt from the requirements that impact the visual representation of the glyphs of a font. In all cases for TrueType fonts that are to be rendered, character codes shall be able to be mapped to glyphs according to ISO 32000-1:2008, 9.6.6.4 without the use of a non-standard mapping chosen by the conforming processor

error.message: Not all glyphs referenced for rendering are present in the embedded font program

rule.description: If the FontDescriptor dictionary of an embedded Type 1 font contains a CharSet string, then it shall list the character names of all glyphs present in the font program, regardless of whether a glyph in the font is referenced or used by the PDF or not
rule.test: fontFile_size == 0 || fontName.search(/[A-Z]{6}\+/) != 0 || CharSet == null || charSetListsAllGlyphs == true

error.message: A CharSet entry in the Descriptor dictionary of a Type1 font incorrectly lists glyphs present in the font program

rule.description: If the FontDescriptor dictionary of an embedded CID font contains a CIDSet stream, then it shall identify all CIDs which are present in the font program, regardless of whether a CID in the font is referenced or used by the PDF or not
rule.test: fontFile_size == 0 || fontName.search(/[A-Z]{6}\+/) != 0 || containsCIDSet == false || cidSetListsAllGlyphs == true

error.message: A CIDSet entry in the Font descriptor does not correctly identify all glyphs present in the embedded font subset

rule.description: For every font embedded in a conforming file and used for rendering, the glyph width information in the font dictionary and in the embedded font program shall be consistent
rule.test: renderingMode == 3 || widthFromFontProgram == null || widthFromDictionary == null || Math.abs(widthFromFontProgram - widthFromDictionary) <= 1

error.message: Glyph width %1 in the embedded font program is not consistent with the Widths entry of the font dictionary (value %2)

rule.description: For all non-symbolic TrueType fonts used for rendering, the embedded TrueType font program shall contain one or several non-symbolic cmap entries such that all necessary glyph lookups can be carried out

error.message: The embedded font program for a non-symbolic TrueType font does not contain non-symbolic cmap entries

rule.description: All non-symbolic TrueType fonts shall have either MacRomanEncoding or WinAnsiEncoding as the value for the Encoding key in the Font dictionary or as the value for the BaseEncoding key in the dictionary which is the value of the Encoding key in the Font dictionary. In addition, no non-symbolic TrueType font shall define a Differences array unless all of the glyph names in the Differences array are listed in the Adobe Glyph List and the embedded font program contains at least the Microsoft Unicode (3,1 – Platform ID=3, Encoding ID=1) encoding in the 'cmap' table
rule.test: isSymbolic == true || ((Encoding == "MacRomanEncoding" || Encoding == "WinAnsiEncoding") && (containsDifferences == false || differencesAreUnicodeCompliant == true))

error.message: A non-symbolic TrueType font encoding does not define a correct mapping to the Adobe Glyph List (Encoding = %1, Encoding entry contains a Differences = %2, Differences are Unicode compliant = %3)

rule.description: Symbolic TrueType fonts shall not contain an Encoding entry in the font dictionary

error.message: A symbolic TrueType font specifies an Encoding entry in its dictionary

rule.description: The 'cmap' table in the embedded font program for a symbolic TrueType font shall contain either exactly one encoding or it shall contain, at least, the Microsoft Symbol (3,0 - Platform ID=3, Encoding ID=0) encoding

error.message: The embedded font program for a symbolic TrueType font contains %1 cmap subtables and does not contain Microsoft Symbol (3,0 – Platform ID=3, Encoding ID=0)

rule.description: The Font dictionary of all fonts shall define the map of all used character codes to Unicode values, either via a ToUnicode entry, or other mechanisms as defined in ISO 14289-1, 7.21.7

error.message: The glyph can not be mapped to Unicode

rule.description: The Unicode values specified in the ToUnicode CMap shall all be greater than zero (0), but not equal to either U+FEFF or U+FFFE

error.message: The glyph has an invalid Unicode value, which is either 0, or is equal to U+FEFF or U+FFFE

rule.description: A PDF/UA compliant document shall not contain a reference to the .notdef glyph from any of the text showing operators, regardless of text rendering mode, in any content stream

error.message: The document contains a reference to the .notdef glyph
